```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, 
                      message = FALSE,

```

```{r}
library(papaja)
library(rmarkdown)
library(tidyverse) 
library(here)
library(glue)
library(metafor)
library(knitr)
library(gridExtra)
library(here)
library(heatmaply)
library(MuMIn)
library(glmulti)
library(PRISMAstatement)

DATA_PATH <- here("data/processed/syntactic_bootstrapping_tidy_data.csv") 
RAW_DATA_PATH <- here("data/raw/syntactic_bootstrapping_raw_data.csv")

ma_data <- read_csv(DATA_PATH) %>% filter(paradigm_type == "action_matching")
```

# null non-nested: 
```{r}

rma.mv(d_calc, V = d_var_calc,
                      random = ~ 1 | short_cite,
                      method = "REML",
                      data = ma_data)
  
  
```

# null neseted
```{r}
rma.mv(d_calc, V = d_var_calc,
                      random = ~ 1 | short_cite/same_infant,
                      method = "REML",
                      data = ma_data)

```

# sentence structure non-nested 
```{r}


rma.mv(d_calc~sentence_structure, V = d_var_calc,
                      random = ~ 1 | short_cite,
                      method = "REML",
                      data = ma_data)
```

# sentence structure nested
```{r}
rma.mv(d_calc~sentence_structure, V = d_var_calc,
                      random = ~ 1 | short_cite/same_infant,
                      method = "REML",
                      data = ma_data)

```
